content.detailedDescription:
1. out in my yard looking in a northeast direction watching for possible fireballs from the current meteor shower.
2. i just happened to catch a glimpse of it just below of where my line of sight was. good enough to know for sure it was not like anything i've ever seen.
3. first instinct was thinking it was a black bird in the far distance.
4. small dark/black sphere moving at extremely high rate of speed from south to north.  no elevation change noted.  moving so fast it was only a split second that i was able to see it before out of sight behind trees nearby.
5. i felt confused because at first my brain categorized it as a black bird but i knew it wasn't. it was moving way too fast and too small and definitely had a sphere shape.  i kept playing it over and over in my head and couldn't rationalize anything other than it being a ufo.  i was excited and disappointed because it happened so fast.
6. it went out of sight behind some nearby trees.
content.summary: Hyper fast small dark ball flying from what appeared to be south to north direction.

content.detailedDescription: I was outside just having a smoke on the balcony. there is a current celebration feast going on in the town over from me and in the difforest direction. i could see flashing from the fireworks and started to look in that direction. panned my head back around and saw this bright red light and thought it was a flare or potential firework but then notice a pulsing light, anyway i observed it more and notice no fluctuation in height, it was just hovering. i watched as the light dimmed more and more and as it got to its smallest point it just shot off in to the distance and i mean at an alarming speed, like something had startled it. when i first saw it i was just a bit drawn back and kind of just shook it off at first and as i watched more and more it was just getting brighter and i ended up just stood there not really knowing what to do and my body froze as my eyes tried to keep locked on it. i lost sight of the object because it just faded in to nothing and left a trail as it moved off in a northerly direction.
content.summary: Bright red pulsing light, if close then possibly blinding.

content.detailedDescription:
Note to staff: this is the 4th time i've tried to submit this report along with about 10 photos. each time i press "submit " , it looks like it's uploading for about 2-3 minutes then i get an error message that says server not found. the internet connection is always there, yet nothing is getting uploaded. this time i will just do the report and not send photos with it. i hope to get the photos to you via email as this forum doesn't seem to work. 😳
on the evening of 11-13-2016, a few minutes before 7:00 pm i went outside to my front yard area to take photos of the super moon.  i used my iphone camera, and took the first picture. i checked it and didn't like it, so i began to take another one. as i raised my phone up and looked through the lens, i saw an extra "spot" of light appear in the vicinity of the moon. i lowered the camera and didn't see it with my naked eyes, so i tried again. the spot came back but i took some photos anyway.
over the course of the next 3 hours or so, i would go in and out of the house to finish the dinner cleanup, etc. and also to clean the camera lenses with an alcohol wipe because i thought something was on the lens and it was perhaps projecting something into the photos.
at first i thought the front street light was to blame, but it's behind me and past my driveway and also partially hidden behind my tree.  my son also suggested it could be "lens flare" which  i don't understand.  i did go into the backyard later on to take more photos because it was darker back there.
the same thing occurred: little orbs showing up in the photos and in different places around the moon too. some of the pictures are seconds apart and the orb is in different locations even though i'm barely moving the camera position.
when i zoomed out the first few photos to look at them and saw the "spot" i was surprised to see it looked like a blue ball! i thought it was funny that the moon looked as if it had a little blue planet orbiting it! i believe the last photo i took has a grayish sphere in it and it looks like it's in front of a tree or above it in the backyard. i didn't notice it at first until i looked at the photo with a magnifying glass.
there are 17 total photos with the orb clearly showing in 11 of them. the rest of the pictures have streaks or colorful smudges in them for lack of a better description. i hope you can analyze the photos and tell me if it was something or nothing! please let me know if i can email the photos, as this form doesn't seem to be working. thanks so much!
content.summary: A blue orb/sphere kept showing up in my photos i was taking of the super moon in november of 2016

content.detailedDescription: Boule lumineuse poursuivie par avions de chasse / cas à affecter à enquêteur 24198
content.summary: Boule lumineuse poursuivie par avions de chasse

content.detailedDescription:
On the evening of 11-13-2016, about a little before 7:00 pm, i went outside of my house to the front yard so i could take some photos of the super moon. i had my iphone camera on and i faced towards the east and the right front side of my house. i looked up at the moon first, then i raised my phone to take a couple of pictures. almost immediately i noticed an extra "spot" of light in the photo next to the moon.  i raised my phone again and looked through the lens and saw the spot of light, but when i lowered the camera i didn't see the "spot" by the moon.
i checked one of the photos then by zooming it out and noticed something that looked like a blue ball next to the moon. i thought it was funny, because it looked as if the moon had a little planet next to it!  at this point, i thought my lens might have something on it, so i went back inside and cleaned both phone lenses with an alcohol wipe.  i went outside again to the front yard, raised the phone, looked through the lens and saw the same "light spot" once more.  now i'm thinking the street light is somehow interfering with my photos, but i don't see how, because the street light is behind me and past my driveway over my left shoulder and approximately to the southwest.  it is also a bit hidden behind one of my trees.
over the course of the next 3 hours or so, i am going in and out of the house to finish the dinner dishes and cleaning up and also wanting to get more moon pictures.  at one point, my son tells me maybe the orb/sphere in my photos is "lens flare" but i don't know what that means. ☺️  towards the end of the evening i go into the backyard because it's darker there and the upper porch lights are off, so i think i'll get better pictures. i'm standing on the porch stairs and facing east/southeast and taking pictures above the trees and once again i get the same bluish orb in the photos!  when i looked at them later, i noticed the sphere would be in different places in relation to the moon even if the photos were taken seconds apart and also if i didn't move the camera very much.
there are 17 total photos and the orb appears  clearly in 11 of them and in the rest i just see some colorful streaks or smudges for lack of a better description. one of the last photos i looked at with a magnifying glass and it looked as if a grayish or white outline of a sphere was right over or in front of one of the trees in my backyard.  that kind of made me feel weird to see that!
i hope you can analyze the photos and tell me if it was something or nothing.
thanks!
content.summary: A sphere/orb kept appearing in my photos that i took of the super moon last year.

content.detailedDescription: i was in the back room of my house winding down for the night about to go to bed.  suddenly, i saw these two twirling lights outside my window.  because there are woods behind my house i figured it was probably some kids trying to mess with me with a flashlight. in fact, my dogs noticed the lights first. after that, i went outside and to my amazement, there were two orbs tracing around my window and then they started to ascend and hover over my privacy fence. in the video, the double oblong fixture is actually my back den window, and the reason i kept going back to it is so that if someone were to watch this video they could tell the proximity the orbs were from my house. as they hovered over my fence, they warped shapes, sometimes even blinked in and out at times disappearing. it looked to me as if they were feeding energy off one another, or maybe it was some weird form of communication.  the ironic thing is, my dogs who are usually rambunctious, went stoic and stood side by side not taking their eyes off the lights. i actually have a picture of that as well. i'm not trying to gain anything from this video other than a logical explanation. granted, i do live in columbus, georgia which is about 40 minutes from ft. benning's military base.  i've shown people this video who have worked for the government before and they all said the same thing, that this is nothing they have ever seen in the military.  i would be thrilled for someone to take a look at this video and after watching it in it's entirety, please help explain this bizarre event.  thank you for you all's time.
content.summary: It hovered, pulsated, and steadily started to ascend

content.detailedDescription:
A guy i was dating last year had taken me out for a jeep ride around the back forest roads of lassen national volcanic park, outside of shingletown, ca.  i noticed a rock formation that had a face that looked very much like a classic hook-nosed witch. i couldn't get a very good photo due to the distance away with my phone's camera, so he returned the next day with his dslr to photograph the formation for me (to which i had given the name "witch rock").
he posted the images on imugur the next day, and sent me a link.  he took several photos of the formation, and i noticed in one of them, there is a dark grey disc like object just below the witch's nose.  zooming in on it, it appears to be a disc shape, casting a shadow on its underside.  interestingly, several photos were taken in quick succession, but only this one photo shows the object. it must have been moving faster than the eye can see, because my friend observed nothing in person.  the fact that it stands out grey against the white clouds behind it says it was somewhat near.
i've been meaning to send this to you guys forever, but it took awhile for me to get jason to consent to sharing it. i'm going to attach the clean copy he emailed me at my request, as well as the ones i enhanced for better observation.  i'll throw in a couple of the others that don't show the object too, since i think this helps confirm it was not a lens anomaly.
content.summary: Disc-like object discovered in photos taken of rock formation

content.detailedDescription:
Nous sommes sortis sur notre terrasse. il était environ 22 h. en face, il y a une colline nommée le défends. c'est sauvage, peuplé de pins, de chênes, et autres espèces méditerranéennes, et derrière, il y a un plateau, sauvage également et d'autres collines. il n'y a pas d’habitations, quelques chemins, mais difficiles d’accès, à pied. pas d’accès voiture. de derrière la colline rayonnaient 3 faisceaux, immenses, semblables à des faisceaux émis par des phares de véhicule ou à des aurores boréales ( mais cela n'en étaient pas, car c'était blanc, et qu'il n'y en a pas dans la région). ces trois faisceaux de lumière ne bougeaient pas et nous sommes sortis plusieurs fois les observer. quand j'ai cessé l'observation, vers 23 h, ils étaient toujours là, dans la même inclinaison sud sud-ouest, orientés vers la voie lactée.
le ciel était pur, sans nuages, et parsemé de milliers d'étoiles brillantes. entre deux des faisceaux, un point rouge bougeait de droit à gauche, de gauche à droite, il était très petit, et a vite disparu. nous avons d'abord pensé à un phénomène météorologique, mais c'était une nuit sans vent, sans nuages, sans perturbation particulière. c'était beau et en même temps une sensation bizarre, intrigante teintée d'une légère inquiétude.
merci d'attribuer ce cas à frédéric deblois.
content.summary: 3 faisceaux lumineux surgis de derrière une colline et restés là immobiles longtemps

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in my backyard having a cigarette and there was a full moon out so i thought i would take a picture of it so i could send it to a friend in florida. when i went to send it i looked at it this was there. so i took several photos some had this and some didnt. this happened 2 nights in a row. you have any clue what this might be?
content.summary: Seemed to have humanlike characteristics. i observed it 2 nights in a row

content.detailedDescription: At about 9pm i was on the back porch of my house feeding the cats and then i looked up to see a very bright star almost at the zenith but soon enough i realized it was moving quickly on a straight path to the south east. i noticed the constellation scorpio to the right of the sighting. another sighting was reported on mufon here and there was video taken. i didn't because i was mesmerized and astonished. after about a minute the object disappeared into the distance as if it exited atmosphere or entered hazy atmosphere. this is my first ufo sighting and i am a skeptical. this was not the iss -- i checked. i can't explain what i saw.
content.summary: Bright as the full moon, solid, star-like in shape, ~3-5x bigger than venus over spring tx heading southeast then disappeared into haze

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: On 8/8/17 @ approx. 7:45 pm in hockessin, de., my son was looking up into a tree to try and get a ball down, which was stuck. as he was looking up he noticed a very bright object.  the object disappeared.  suddenly it reappeared but in a different spot.  this sequence happened at least 10 times. he took out his phone and shot some really interesting pictures. he was really scared. note, other kids witnessed the event.  they were all freaked out.  the pictures seem to show a oval type object with a well defined rectangular, brightly lite center. it is definitely not a blimp. you can tell from the pictures that the object is in different positions.  the pictures are really cool!!!
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Son took pictures of an indescribeable object.Object disappeared and reappeared at least 10 times. each time it reappeared in a different spot.

content.detailedDescription: I was leaving work and stepped out the building, as i was walking to my car i noticed 3 bright lights in the sky. i quickly got my camera out, as at first it appeared as though the lights were stationary, and too bright to be stars. as i observed for a few seconds i could see them moving, as you can see in relation to the star in the background. they appear to follow each other, would could easily be 3 planes on a flight path. the fact that they were so close to each other, and initially appeared yo be hovering made me question the 3 planes theory. i filmed it for a little bit until they dissapeared out of my view. i was unsure, so didnt do anything about it, but thought its worth a second opinion.
content.summary: Three lights flying close to eachother

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: My mother was driving me down fair avenue in lancaster, ohio on january 24th of 2016. we were headed west bound when at approximately 4:45pm, we suddenly seen a fireball soaring  through the sky. i began taking pictures as my video wouldn't record. we followed a few blocks and watched it suddenly slow down and begin to change shape. it had been almost a full minute we had been following it when the fireball became something else. a shapeless hovering mass in the sky. after only a few seconds it was moving back up to its original path and began moving faster than it had when we originally spotted it. we followed on for almost 20 more blocks, in which time 3 minutes had passed since the initial sighting began. when the hypnotizing object slowed to its original speed it seemed to start ascending higher. we found ourselves chasing it, until the direction it was headed was beyond a hillside full of trees and no way to access it. we chased it for as long as we could, and took some very intriguing photos of. i have been searching for answers since that day, which led me to other more unusual sightings and ufo phenomenon. i still have no idea about the reality of the fireball. however as a side note, the much larger sun is visible in the sky in some of the photos. the photos taken were taken with iphone 6s+ so they are live photos.. so they do have  playable video on other apple devices.
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 3 minute encounter with a hovering/ shape shifting fireball. photo evidence

content.detailedDescription: My mother was driving me down fair avenue in lancaster, ohio on january 24th of 2016. we were headed west bound when at approximately 4:45pm, we suddenly seen a fireball soaring  through the sky. i began taking pictures as my video wouldn't record. we followed a few blocks and watched it suddenly slow down and begin to change shape. it had been almost a full minute we had been following it when the fireball became something else. a shapeless hovering mass in the sky. after only a few seconds it was moving back up to its original path and began moving faster than it had when we originally spotted it. we followed on for almost 20 more blocks, in which time 3 minutes had passed since the initial sighting began. when the hypnotizing object slowed to its original speed it seemed to start ascending higher. we found ourselves chasing it, until the direction it was headed was beyond a hillside full of trees and no way to access it. we chased it for as long as we could, and took some very intriguing photos of. i have been searching for answers since that day, which led me to other more unusual sightings and ufo phenomenon. i still have no idea about the reality of the fireball. however as a side note, the much larger sun is visible in the sky in some of the photos.
content.summary: Followed a fireball for roughly 3 min in which it stopped suddenly and seemed to change shape before ascending, before continuing and disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: Let dogs out to pee at 1:58am light in sky were you can see stars. object light/orb changed brightness almost like a pulse, and size changed a bit, smaller to bigger then back. moved around in area fast. but stayed. it's not the first time i've seen this light.
content.summary: Orb/light brightness changed moved around didn't leave

content.detailedDescription: i was actually in the farthest back room in my house, or the "den."  it was late, maybe approx. 1:30 a.M , and i had been out to eat with friends for food and drinks. i have two dogs who stay primarily inside, however, they started barking at the den window as i watched t.V. and got ready for bed.  when i looked towards the den window, i noticed a beam, or what i thought may be someone with a flashlight behind my privacy fence because my house does back up to about 3/4 a mile of woods, and slightly back to the left, a family/neighborhood park. agitated, i went outside to try and find the culprit, when to my surprise, there was an illuminating, glowing sphere, about six feet above my privacy fence (from the ground, the "orb" was probably 14 feet above).  i watched in amazement as my dogs went stoic and didn't take their eyes off of it, then all of a sudden it seemed like it was trying to communicate with me by glowing brighter, then dimming, almost into disappearance.  i watched for minutes, then suddenly, one "orb" morphed into two! however, the original one acted as if it was the "mother load," and stayed in front of the smaller one, trying to guide it almost.  it seemed as if they were feeding off one another for energy.  over a span of at least 20 minutes, they slowly, then more quickly, ascended towards the sky, and as they did you could hear them take off.  i added the fact that yes, i went out with friends for food and "drinks" because had i not recorded it, the next morning i wouldn't have believed what i had seen. the video does not lie and i assure you it is legitimate.  i am the least technologically saavy person ever!  just please take the time and watch the video in it's entirety.
content.summary: It hovered, pulsated, and steadily started to ascend

content.detailedDescription:
1. my wife and i were sitting outside on our outside deck after dinner.
2. i heard a jet aircraft (civilian) flying overhead, and looked up and saw the aircraft and then the unknown object.
3. i thought it was another aircraft, but then it moved and stopped overhead, and then move again, blinking or flashing the orange sunset.
4. the object was a discoloration (grey color) spot in the sky, with one and or or two bright orange round lights alternately, reflections or flashing in the sunset, i assume. 
5. i could clearly see the civilian jet (white in color) as it flew off and this unknown object that wasn't behaving anything like a normal aircraft. the jet moved off to the south west, and the unknown object remained in place, moving around slightly.
6. i attempted to get my wife to see the object, but she could not find it in the sky (looking in the wrong spot)and was frustrated. i observed the object for several minutes as it moved around slightly, and flashed one or two round orange lights. this appeared to be at high attitude. after several minutes of observation, 2-3 minutes, i ran into the house to get my binoculars which were handy (10 -20 seconds away), but when i came out, the object was no longer visible, and never reappeared for the next 40 minutes or so.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: The object moved and would then flash one or two round orange lights and then hover in the same spot and then move again, at what would appear to be a high altitude.

content.detailedDescription:
1. outside smoking. couldn't sleep. noticed a green flash. looked up and saw what appeared to be two objects. went inside to get my cell phone.
came back out. only the one bright object.
wouldn't have thought anything of it if i had not seen the green flash and saw the other object which i couldn't tell the color of. i only have pictures of the stationary object which is probably a star or venus.
after that, i took several pictures from 5:50am until 6:37am until clouds obstructed the remaining object.
not sure what it was or is.
probably a star or venus. but i have several pictures of it.
sun rose. clouds got in the way and it was gone.
again, probably a star or venus.
i don't know how to get the pictures on my phone on here.
but i have quite a few. my friends suggested i email this. i will feel quite silly if it was just a planet or star but it was an odd enough event that i felt compelled to tell them. 
you are welcome to all of my pictures taken in sequence. you can have all of them. i only have the bright object but if i enlarge the pictures on my phone it takes on a cylindrical type shape.

thanks
content.summary: I saw a green light or another dark object hit it and then it stayed there.

content.detailedDescription: I was outside looking at lightening storms, and for the rare perseid meteor then the following occurred.First object; orange gold coloration, orb/spherical in shape. fast walking from west to east. traveled entire horizon in less than 4 minutes. after disappearing over horizon line, approximately 2 minutes passes, then either the same object made a 100 plus degree turn and traveled at the same speed towards the northeast at the same high rate of speed. third object seen 10-15 minutes later traveling north to south. appeared larger (or possibly lower), blueish silver in color traveling slightly slower than the other two. to early in the evening for satellites,also these objects/craft were moving far faster than satellites. iss on the other side of the planet, no standard aircraft in the area at that time. no iridium flares. no color changes nor changes in brightness. my feelings were thus; its about time that i was able to see something i could not identify. all object sightings lost at horizon lines.
content.summary: Golden orange orb traveling east to west horizon to horizon in less than 3 minutes.

content.detailedDescription: Actually, this is the second time i see a black big triangle in the sky, the first time i was walking through bermuda dunes country club around 8 pm past year september and we saw the same object. this time, i was alone and without planning it i saw up looking for my car mirror just before going to work and i saw the same black big triangle with e round lights in each corner and a big light round in the middle, there was not noise.
content.summary: Arriving at parking i saw up while watching my mirror and i saw the big black triangle

content.detailedDescription:
Driving westbound on the i90 notice a bright green
light on the eastbound side of the thruway over tree tops 
it quickly accelerated and within 5-10 seconds it disappeared
content.summary: Driving westbound i90 from waterloo ramp noticed a bright green tear shape light

content.detailedDescription:
At approximately 21:30/9:30 pm on 08/11/17 my wife, my 9 year old daughter and a 9 year old friend of my daughters, were out on our back deck looking for meteorites.  my wife pointed out a white pulsating light to the west of our house, quite high in the sky, and in the area of the muscatine municipal airport.  the pulse was was white and was followed by a much bigger and brighter flash.  there was several seconds between the flashes, sometimes about 20 seconds.  the object was moving from east to west and was moving quite slow.  at one point it appeared to have moved in reverse.  it also appeared to change directions to the north, and then a few moments later, continued east, and we lost sight of the object.  the whole incident took 5-7 minutes.  i couldn't see any shape to the object due to it being dark, and not having any binoculars handy.  i did video the flashes on my phone, but its really not great video.

on 08/12/17 at approximately the same time, the object again appeared and flew in the same manner and direction, for approximately the same time.  this was also witnessed by the same people from 08/11.

08/13/17 there was to much cloud cover to view the object.

08/14/17 again at approximately 9:30 pm, i was watching for it.  visibility was good, and i could see several airplanes in the sky.  i should have seen this approaching, but it just seemed to appear out of nowhere.  my wife also witnessed this.  this time on one of the flashes i thought i could see a small dim red light to the right of the white flash.  on the bright flash, it appeared to throw off an arc of light.  the object was traveling west to east as before.  this time it did not disappear over the house and out of sight, it just disappeared. 

i will be looking again tomorrow, and will have a video camera.
content.summary: Flashing white light followed by a much brighter flash of white light.

content.detailedDescription: I went out at 10:30pm on sunday august 13th with my son to look for meteors. i googled which direction the pleiades were and we started looking towards the ne. while looking up, and keeping our heads stationary, i saw a bright flash to my left a bit and saw this star, which was 10 times bigger and brighter than the iss when it goes over head. it blinked out after a solid second, but it wasn't an instant off, it kind of phased out. i asked my son if he saw it and he said no. about 4 minutes later, in the exact same spot it phased on, solid second, phased out. this one my son did see. about 4 minutes later it did the exact same thing. about ten minutes later it was back, same exact process, but it only did it twice, and it was about 2 feet to the left and a foot lower. about ten minutes later it was back, same process, but only did it once, and this time farther to the left and up a little higher. by 11.30 the clouds had rolled in and our visibility was lost.
content.summary: Extremely bright "star" blinked on, then blinked off. total of six times in three locations. the blinks were gradual not instant on/off

content.detailedDescription: Evening.I took my dog out in the back yard. while he was sniffing around i remembered that we should have now the perseids which i enjoyed many times watching them. so i looked up, hoping to see a shooting star. there were scattered clowds so i tried to peak beyond them, which was possible, watched a few stars glittering and then, towards the north i saw something that i could not explain. a group of 7-8 lights turning off - seemingly flying in a vshape formation. i thought maybe was one single craft (it would have been huge if it was), but the lights seemed to move a little one from the other). there was no sound from it, i was hearing clearly the crickets in my garden and absolutely nothing else. they drifted, almost gliding, or floating, without any effort. i tried to be objective, but i could still not explain what i have seen. i did not want to go inside for my cell, as i could have missed it all along, so i preferred to watch them as they moved south. it seems as everything was in slow motion, however, after i analysed, i realized that it must have been actually very fast, as i seldom see planes crossing the sky. usually a plane crosses 3 times slower than the object i have seen. altogether the whole thing must have lasted for about 1 minute. i wonder if anybody else was able to see it tonight.
content.summary: A series of white lights in vshape formation without sound - flying seemingly effortless

content.detailedDescription: In backyard looked south saw 25+ white objects in sky. looked as if they were blinking in and out of view.. asked wife to come outside and confirm and she did. tried to take photos with iphone and seemed to far away. no clouds and no other aircraft seen in sky
content.summary: In backyard looked south saw 25+ white objects in clear blue sky called wife to confirm they moved south west then disappeared

content.detailedDescription: Saw solid light traveling toeards the southeast. too high for normal airport traffic. did not blink, was solid for 60 seconds. went out of video range on iphone before it faded to nothing.
content.summary: Solid light faded then disappeared

content.detailedDescription: On the clear night of august 13 2017 i was sitting in my front yard watching for the persieds meteor shower. at 11:35 a bright flash of light caught my sight in my peripheral vision. as i looked to it direction, nnw, i noticed a light that changed in intensity as it came on and would then go out for 10-30 seconds each time. at first there seemed to be two seperate flashing lights but they were following an erratic positions in the sky. staying in one place then moving forward and back then sideways. the overall pattern was like two l's hooked together. i observed these light for what seemed like about 10 minutes. at about 5 minutes in to observing the lights, all of a sudden a large sized rectangular light bluish/white flashed in the area i was watching and went out. it only lasted a couple seconds. then went back to a single intermittent flashing white light. . the lights were very slow moving and erratic in its movements but after the lighted rectangular light flashed on and off it slowly moved straight east and then just disappeared. this incident still has me upset and unsettled. when i saw the large rectangular light flash, i almost ran inside my house because something was so weird about it and i couldn't tell for sure but looked like there was a dark black craft when the rectangle flashed but i could not make out a shape. i can still see that lighted rectangular light when i close my eyes. i will never forget that sight. ever.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: White lights changing direction then a bright rectangle light flashed on then off, craft then went back to pulsating flashing light.

content.detailedDescription:
On the evening of 11-13-2016, i went outside to the front of my house so i could take a few photos of the super moon.  it was clear and the moon of course was bright.  i was facing the east and towards the front of my house with the street behind me. i looked up at the moon and then i raised my iphone up to take pictures. i kept seeing an extra "spot" of something shiny whenever i looked through the lens, but took the photos anyway. i looked at each photo after taking them to see if they were good to keep or delete. at first, i thought something was wrong with the camera or maybe the lens had something on it, because these extra lights were in the photos with the moon.  i went back inside to tell my husband that the moon looked great, but i kept seeing these extra spots that looked like orbs. i got a lens cleaning wipe and cleaned both sides of the phone even though i was only using the front facing lens. then i thought that maybe the streetlight was somehow interfering with the photos, even though it was behind me and not centered in front of my house but past it and my driveway.
i began taking pictures a little before 7:00 pm and went in and out of the house to finish dinner and cleaning up the kitchen, etc. i took about 17 pictures with the first one time stamped at 6:57 pm and my last one at 9:16.  i also went into my backyard on the stairs to the upper porch and had the back lights off so it would be darker.
i took more photos facing east/southeast and the orb/sphere showed up again in the photos.  for some reason, i couldn't see this thing with the naked eye, but it would appear in the photos.  at one point, i was told it could be "lens flare" which doesn't mean anything to me. ☺️
i did notice the sphere would be in different places in photos taken seconds or a minute apart.
there are a  total of 17 photos with the orb appearing in 11 or 12 of them. some of the photos have what appears to be smudges of different colors or streaks for lack of a better description.
i thought the blue sphere looked so cool, especially when it looked like it was a little planet orbiting the moon!  i hope you can analyze the photos and let me know if it was something or just nothing. thanks!
content.summary: A blue orb/sphere appears in my camera lens and several photos during a super moon event
